api_list.api_description: Fetch a random dad joke in the specified format

optional_parameters.name: accept
optional_parameters.description: The format to accept the joke in

api_list.api_description: Returns the runedate of when the Grand Exchange Database was last updated.

query: I'm feeling down and need a laugh, can you tell me a random dad joke? Also, can you let me know when the RuneScape Grand Exchange Database was last updated?
